## Metadata fields

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

Retrieve some variation entries

```{sql}
SELECT distinct Run, variation
FROM "ncbi-vcf-codeathon-rc-db1"."annotated_variations"
LIMIT 10
```

Check what organisms are

```{sql}
select distinct organism, count(*) from "metadata" group by organism order by count(*) desc limit 10
```
